rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Swarming Bat enters the battlefield, if its ambush cost was paid, put two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Ambush {4}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this spell as though it had flash for its ambush cost as long as a creature is attacking you. If you do, this creature enters the battlefield blocking an attacking creature if able.)[/i]
